ygData.messageBody:
Hehe My main is a 51 DE SK named Cynfyn MacCulloch and I used my SCA name
lol and then there is my 30 Shaman Halyburton who, quite by accident, has
our Triskele Herald's (Master Sebastian Halyburton) surname LOL

Ld Cynfyn ap Rhydderch MacCulloch
Deputy Constable for Lost and Found,Trimaris
Sundial Herald Trimaris
Deputy Marshal, Rapier, Shire of Castlemere
Deputy Webminister, Shire of Castlemere


Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 30 BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Oroblram 9 Hu War
Doktari 7 HIE Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn Server
DoF Email list: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/DoFGuild/




----- Original Message -----
From: "Jenn" <juniper.jot@...>



> All the SCAdian talk has got me thinking. I wonder how many EQ players
> are also SCAdians and also how many used their SCA name for EQ, like me?
>
> Lets see my names are:
> Bebinn Maolcataig, beloved consort of Wolfgang Schwartzvald, Barony of
> Bright Hills, Atlantia.
>
> Bebinn Maolcataig, 26 Woodelf Druid, Dignatio cum Demori guild, Bertoxx
> server
>
> and
>
> Lindira, 23 Vah Shir Bard, Bertoxx server, *looking for other Vahshir to
> help complete sonic weapon quest, if you like quests and know about
> warrior, shaman or rogue classes, consider making a vahshir*
